analysis.description:
MainBonus.ImmediateProfit (/unique_chucks/13/0xf630f86fbb0097db990618b396078a5c340fe3cc.sol#748-756) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- acc.transfer(bonus) (/unique_chucks/13/0xf630f86fbb0097db990618b396078a5c340fe3cc.sol#756)

	Dangerous calls:
